programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaos's journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: The most battle-hardened combat robots in the UK compete in the MechMania Grand Final. After three grueling heats, only the toughest survive. The tournament is now a single-elimination, 1v1, sudden-death formatuntil one team emerges as the victorious champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Robot Wars returns. The House Robots have been upgraded and are ready to dismantle any of the 40 competing teams brave enough to enter the hazardous arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A Consultant Cardiologist and his two sons try their luck with a brand new, untested machine. Judge Sethu Vijayakumar discusses his work with Nasa in creating androids for the Mission to Mars.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This show features an eclectic collection of home-made robots, one designed by a nine year old and another constructed out of wood. Some competitors from the Classic series return to the arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In this show we see the former Holiday camp Bluecoats daring to flip two of the House Robots with their ‘launcher’ Apollo. The most expensive Robot in the Series competes in this Heat.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This features one of the most bizarre but certainly the tallest robot ever seen on Robot Wars, Gabriel, built my Mensa member Craig and his three sons.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In this show the heat winners in shows 1 to 5 come back to fight again. The judges must choose one Wild Card from the runners up to join them.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first heat of the second Revival Series begins. Robots return from previous series to take on the daring newcomers and each other. Competitors get bullied and thrown around the ring as they desperately try to scrape a place in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A tentative start to the second heat ends in carnage as the house robots and competitors go all out to qualify. Shunt delivers the final blow for one contestant.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The third heat shows devastating weapons put into action, being on the receiving end of these could mean elimination for an unlucky competitor. The house robots take on cleaning duties as they remove immobilised robots from the arena floor.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: One competitor draws first blood only seconds into the first round. After suffering severe damage at the hands of another competitor, one robots chance at the finals may be lost.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The last chance for combatants to fight for a place in the Grand Final. With the newcomers outnumbering the veterans, will the first timers make up for their lack of experience?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: This episode, a new Robot Wars champion will emerge! Sparks and scraps are sure to fly in this explosive series finale. Winners will have to make it through the four-way melees and head-to-head battles to be able to prove themselves in the final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Newcomers, veterans and a recent President enter the fray in this first Heat of the series. Competitors are eliminated left, right and centre and only the strongest will survive to compete in the finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A veteran only heat features the current reigning Champions, Carbide. Will Carbide’s streak be brought to an end by the other robots, more experienced and eager than ever?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Even the judges aren’t safe as two robots collide, sending shrapnel through the bullet-resistant shields around the arena. Two very different styles of robot meet in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.
